title: Impact
html:
Home » About Us » Impact

We’re making

a difference… thanks to you.

Put your money where your faith is.

AGFinancial was created to support churches and ministries, ministers, and individuals by improving financial health and growing the Kingdom of God. As a customer, you become part of that vision. We’re ministry allies.

It’s our privilege to serve you, alongside you.

4,000

Fueling churches and ministries every year.

From vision loans to construction loans, we are here to support your goals.

Explore Loans

$40 Million

Under trusted care. Your foundation deserves the same.

Planning your generosity’s future can be messy. We’ve done this since 1989 and our organizational skills show.

Plan with us

687

Mission trips covered.

Go boldly. We’ve got your back.

Cover your trip

299

Ministers retired this year with AGFinancial.

Retirement that honors a lifetime of service.

Start your plan
Bold, smart moves.
Let’s make them together.

Business with AGFinancial means ministry with AGFinancial.

What’s next for you?
